name: Amilia Store
author: Martin Drapeau

sections.description:
Amilia goes beyond online registration with features like an online store, a CRM database and a robust reporting module so you can spend more time developing stronger relationships with your community and your members or evolving new program ideas for them. You’ll have more time to grow your business now that all your day-to-day can be done with one complete software.

Support

  • Visit http://support.amilia.com/ for help from our support team.
sections.installation:
1. Install directly from the Plugins page in your WordPress.
    Alternatively, you can download to the ‘wp-content/plugins/’ directory inside
    of your WordPress.
  2. Activate the Amilia Store plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
    The Amilia store button tool will appear in your editor.
  3. You can avoid re-typing your Amilia Store URL by saving it in WordPress settings.
    Go to the Amilia settings pane and type in your Amilia Store URL.

description:
Amilia goes beyond online registration with features like an online store, a CRM database and a robust reporting module so you can spend more time developing stronger relationships with your community and your members or evolving new program ideas for them. You’ll have more time to grow your business now that all your day-to-day can be done with one complete software.

Support

  • Visit http://support.amilia.com/ for help from our support team.

screenshots.caption: The Amilia Store tool appears in your editor. It allows you to insert shortcodes to inject your Amilia store, a button, a table of activities or a calendar of activities. Click again to update or remove a shortcode.
When the page is previewed and published, the shortcodes are transformed into the desired component.
Also supports Gutenberg or WordPress 5 by introducing new Embed blocks.
